title: Mathematical Analysis Competency Development Project for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Proportionality, Algebra) and Foundational Educational Methodologies
context.additional_context: Team activities using smartphone-based collaboration tools and weekly feedback sessions.

learning_goals: Achieve the ability to solve mathematical problems (proportional/algebraic) using at least two different methods
Identify and explain mathematical knowledge elements applied to problem-solving with over 80% accuracy
Creatively generate at least three variations of a given problem and analyze their educational validity
Developing the ability to evaluate and integrate peers' problem-solving strategies in team-based discussions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
